jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
jobs.content:
About Audible: 

Audible, Inc. is the world’s largest seller and producer of spoken audio entertainment, information and educational programming. Since inventing and commercializing the first portable digital audio player in 1997, our focus on technological innovation and superior programming has earned us millions of subscribers around the world. We’re an Amazon subsidiary with a presence on three different continents, yet we maintain a startup vibe and small company feel. We offer more than 300,000 downloadable audiobooks, audio editions of periodicals, and other programs, and an escalating array of listening products that enrich daily life for a growing population of people who want to be more productive, well-informed, and thoughtfully entertained.



Do you have a creative edge, strong problem-solving skills, and a solid software development foundation? Then we want to talk with you.



You will:


  • Design, develop, debug high quality scalable services typically in Java

  • Work in an agile environment.

  • Build software solutions for a distributed end to end content management system.

  • Collaborate with your peers on code-reviews and debugging issues.

  • Prepare technical requirements, software design specifications and other forms of documentation.

  • Communicate effectively with team members to ensure development projects meet or exceed performance targets.

  • Deliver first-class work on aggressive schedules.




Here at Audible, we want you to think bold, act decisively and be part of the solution.



Qualifications: 


  • B.S. in computer science or equivalent.

  • 4+ years of software development experience.

  • Excellent object oriented analysis and design skills (OOA/OOD).

  • Familiarity with Unix/Linux environments.

  • Be able to thrive in an ambiguous environment - where change is the only constant.

  • Strong analytical skills and an out-of-the box thinker

  • Results-oriented and with strong customer focus

  • Self-motivated, accountable, and having a sense of ownership; take pride in what you code



Preferred Qualifications: 

Don't worry, we'll ramp you up but experience in any of these areas will help you hit the ground running:




  • Experience developing for Android, iOS and/or Windows platforms

  • Understanding of web services technologies, typically HTTP, RESTful, JSON, XML, etc.

  • Web based application framework - Java (J2EE Tomcat Servlet container model Spring, Hibernate) or C++

  • Familiarity with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

  • Knowledge of build systems such ANT & Maven

  • Knowledge of data structures and database design

  • Excellent understanding and experience with unit testing, integration testing and/or UI automation




Benefits:             

We have a comprehensive benefits package but here are some of the fun perks:

  • All the snacks you can eat

  • 25% fitness reimbursement

  • Endless company sponsored events

  • Transit reimbursement, paid parking

  • Tuition assistance

  • Annual Amazon discount

  • Access to Amazon Web Services and much more...


 

Audible is an Equal Opportunity-Affirmative Action Employer-Minority/ Female/ Disability/ Vet

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.content:
Join the eXellerator at Standard Chartered and become part of the technical team to grow innovation across the group. This is an unique opportuntity to be in at the start of something new in Standard Chartered Bank. You will use your talents in software development, application architecture, design thinking and problem solving to help create rapid prototypes and enable the rapid acceleration of ideas through the eXellerator Lab. You will work closely with our project team of EIRs and business stakeholders, provide technical expertise that enables innovation.

Key Roles and Responsibilities

The eXellerator lab is a fast paced environment, with multiple projects running concurrently. The nature of work is varied, and spans from working with external vendors, brainstorming ideas with the business, building rapid prototypes, providing technical guidance on proposed solutions and suggesting alternatives. To be a trusted developer within the eXellerator Lab, you will be expected to work closely with the wider innovation team, and with business and technology stakeholders from all areas of the Bank, and be involved in at least two or three projects.

Qualifications and Skills

Technical Aptitude



  • This person will have developed code for several years using Agile methodologies, and will have proven experience as a Sprint member

  • Must be a self starter and be able to quickly grasp and understand a wide variety of software environments and solutions

  • Must have examples from several projects which demonstrate programming capability and experience; preferably in Javascript, Go, Java. Node.js experience is useful

  • Front end programming skills using modern JavaScript frameworks

  • iOS development would be an advantage

  • Comfortable using Windows and Linux

  • Working knowledge of AWS and of Docker

  • BA/BS in Computer Science or similar




Soft skills



  • Fluent in English (speaking and writing)

  • Proven capabilities in interacting with business users to gather requirements

  • Outstanding problem solving skills

  • Proactive, self starter, autonomous

  • Good team spirit

  • Works well with ambiguity






How To Apply

You can search and view current opportunities across our organisation and apply immediately by visiting www.standardchartered.com and selecting Careers. To help speed up your application, please note the following:

- You will need to log in (or register if you are visiting our careers site for the first time) before you can apply for a specific role

- Some roles may require you to undertake an online talent assessment in addition to completing the application form (to facilitate this process it is preferable that you provide us with an email address as part of your contact information)
- We will ask you about your education, career history and skills and experience, it may be helpful to have this information at hand when completing your application

It usually takes 15 - 20 minutes to complete the application form; you can save your application at any time and return to complete it at your convenience.

Closing Dates

The closing date for applications is 07/08/2016. Please note all closing dates are given in Hong Kong time (GMT + 8 hours). We aim to respond to successful applicants within four weeks and will keep a record or your application in our database so that we can contact you when suitable vacancies arise in future.

Diversity and Inclusion

Standard Chartered is committed to diversity and inclusion. We believe that a work environment which embraces diversity will enable us to get the best out of the broadest spectrum of people to sustain strong business performance and competitive advantage. By building an inclusive culture, each employee can develop a sense of belonging, and have the opportunity to maximise their personal potential.

jobs.title: Ruby Developer - Coolest Company for Women Award, 2015
jobs.content:
• Unique scale for an Australian business, world's 4th largest Ruby App by traffic

  • Continuously deployed up to 20 times a day!

  • Work remote from anywhere in Australia or from HQ in Melbourne at one of the Best Places to Work in Australia



We're continuing to grow our team and we're looking for developers who would love the opportunity to work at Australia's premier Ruby development company. We work in small cross functional teams with a variety of skills and experience so, whether you're a passionate Ruby newbie or you've worked at our scale before, we'd love to hear from you.

All applicants will be considered for all open engineering roles across the Envato marketplace (Market, Tuts+, Studio, etc.)



What you'll be doing



  • Writing clean, well thought out and reliable code

  • Participating as a member of a small cross functional team containing members with different skills and experience

  • You'll work on big projects, small maintenance tasks, server management tasks and anything else that makes software our customers love

  • Taking lots of responsibility for your work as most teams don't have analysts, testers or system administrators

  • Taking part in our 24/7 on call rotation supporting one of the biggest web sites in the world



What We've Got


A Great Team and Culture



  • Developers are responsible for features from inception through to them being in the hands of customers. The devs talk directly to customers about what they're working on

  • We do continuous delivery properly: any team member can deploy, and we regularly do several deploys a day

  • We publish portions of our code as open source, and contribute back to open source projects we use

  • We were recently named Australia's Coolest Company for Women by JobAdvisor and one of the Best Places to Work in Australia

  • A fantastic culture of creatively minded, hard working people who are passionate about Envato and being part of its growth and success

  • Flexible working conditions – we want you to love your work but also your life outside of Envato

  • We actively work on creating a safe, inclusive environment free from discrimination

  • In addition to hiring for our Melbourne CBD office, we will also consider applications from experienced Ruby Developers who would like to work remotely (Australia wide)

  • Future career progression will be available across the entire business - we're big on internal opportunities and professional growth!



IMPORTANT INFORMATION: this role is not suitable for people who do not want to live in Australia. You can work in our head office or work remotely while located in Australia.

jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer - EC Marketplace
jobs.content:
The Senior Software Engineer plays a key role in our Marketplace Systems team. They will be responsible but not limited to the design, implementation, and maintenance of web services, as well as internal and external facing web sites.  The Senior Software Engineer with participate in the SCRUM process and work in an Agile culture.


 RESPONSIBILITIES 



  • Responsible for enhancing, maintaining and improving the functionality and performance of existing Marketplace and Marketing APIs, Web services, Windows, and WCF services.

  • Performs a variety of complex tasks, requires strong cognitive skills and prior application in a production environment.

  • Deliver tasks with minimal supervision using appropriate software development processes including Agile/SCRUM

  • Deliver quality products using software engineering best practices like secure coding, unit testing, automation, code profiling and code coverage etc.

  • Engage in effective collaboration among local, geographically-distributed, and cross-functional team members

  • Prioritize and manage multiple assignments and projects

  • A wide degree of creativity and latitude is expected.

  • The individual will be assigned to multiple concurrent projects.

jobs.title: Search Engine Developer
jobs.content:
Rakuten has more than 70 million users and some of the most popular Internet services in Japan today. These services are expanding to Asia, Europe, America and the other regions, currently we are one of the leading company of the area in the world.  The Search Platform our team providing is one of Rakuten's core platform used across its services.  It is the entry point for most customers to purchase products and vital for merchants exposure. 


We are looking for an engineer to contribute in developing brand new search platform and all its components (auto complete, related search, etc.) that will use the latest technologies such as Hadoop, Lucene, Solr, Cassandra, ZooKeeper.  Sounds like an exciting challenge for you?  Apply now!

jobs.title: Senior Database Administrator
jobs.content:
We are looking for a Senior database administrator, to work in a fast paced environment, providing both production & development support.  You will be in charge of the availability and stability of our e-commerce related services such as Rakuten Ichiba, ID, Point Services, Travel, etc.  On a day to day basis, you will deal with high volume traffic and data transaction as well as get a chance to collaborate with colleagues and offices all over the world.



Responsibilities:



  • Provide production support, solutions and expertise for RDBMS.

  • Ability to troubleshoot difficult production issues quickly.

  • Build and maintain mission critical DB clusters as required.

  • Work closely with various development teams across the firm to ensure proper use of DB features, best practices, and adherence to the company's database standards.

  • Help design, maintain, improve and implement monitoring tools.  

  • Handle your share of DBA tickets, user requests, routine support and maintenance.

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer
jobs.content:
• Improve the daily lives of hundreds of thousands of grocery shoppers

  • Design, create, own and maintain our system and service deployments (AWS based)

  • Improve our infrastructure for ease of deployment, scalability, security and fault-tolerance

  • Integrate DevOps with engineering development, service deployment and operations lifecycle

  • Push your limits in creating super clean, well structured, performant, high quality deployment, monitoring and application management scripts

  • Keep up with the latest technologies and define our future technology stack

  • Be challenged every day by our extremely talented team

jobs.title: PHP Engineer for Social Platforms
jobs.content:
The Social Platform Section services (Review platform, Video Platform and Membership platform) are widely used across Rakuten Group's services.  They allow users to interact and lead to huge increase in our merchant's sales.  We are now seeking and looking for a highly talented engineer who is interested in developing and enhancing these platforms. 


Responsibilities:



  • Work cross functionally to create useful solutions for complex business problems;

  • Provide engineer driven solutions for such problems while understanding the needs of our business counterparts;

  • Define and refine feature development specifications by working closely with product management team and UX design teams;

  • Design and develop front-end interfaces, underlying APIs, and backend systems across a number of programming languages with a focus on JavaScript, PHP (cake php);

  • Analyze and improve the efficiency, scalability, stability and operations of business applications and in-house systems.

jobs.title: Senior Site Operations Engineer
jobs.content:
Are you interested in building, implementing, securing and maintaining mission critical distributed infrastructure used by multiple Rakuten group services which consist of millions of users, thousands of servers while all managed by a Global team?  The Site Operations Engineer will be a part of this global team and maintain Rakuten’s core e-commerce services to high levels of availability and security. The engineer will also implement solutions that are highly scalable and focus to increase platform performance and efficiency.



Responsibilities:



  • Improve service availability and scalability through operation processes, and the use of toolsand automation

  • Configure and maintain servers and networks

  • Configure and maintain software components, e.g. Operating Systems, web servers and application runtimes

  • Configure and maintain monitoring components including system/application alerting and logging

  • Configure and maintain system redunduncy and backups

  • Manage network security, routing, bandwidth and performance

  • Participate in shift work for planned maintenance and monitoring activities

  • Perform full operational duties – production systems monitoring and incident detection and response while proactively involving both developers and business side resources

jobs.title: Big Data Engineer
jobs.content:
You will be joining a team in charge of delivering large scale data analytics to Rakuten Business Units globally. This includes the development and recommendation of new Big Data Business Intelligence & Analytics systems; the coding & development of advanced analytics solutions to make/optimize business decisions and processes; searching for and integrating new tools to improve descriptive, predictive, and prescriptive analytics; and discovery of new technical challenges that can be solved with existing and emerging Big Data hardware and software solutions.  If you're highly motivated and looking to use your experience in Business Intelligence, Data Warehousing & analytics, this role is for you!


Responsibilities:



  • Design, implement and manage real-time and near real-time data ingestion pipeline into a data warehouse and Hadoop data lake.

  • Gather and process raw data at scale - collect data across all business domains and expose mechanisms for large scale parallel processing

  • Process unstructured data into a form suitable for analysis and then empower state-of-the-art analysis for analysts, scientists, and APIs.

  • Support business decisions with ad hoc analysis as needed.

  • Create business solutions through a combination of science and software

  • Consider hypothesis by concrete business effects

  • Collaborate with Project Managers, Developers and business staff to develop products & services

  • Participate in managing and maintaining the product on an on-going basis

jobs.title: Senior Java Developer - Platforms & Services
jobs.content:
As an application engineer, you will work on redesigning and developing the platforms at the heart of the Rakuten ecosystem comprising of over 40 products in the field of ecommerce, finance and digital contents. These platforms are serving all clients of Rakuten and Rakuten-affiliated companies, potentially reaching out to over half a billion end-users, posing a magnificent challenge in performance engineering and scalability.  You will work in agile, culturally diverse teams and regularly interface with colleagues around the world.


Responsibilities:



  • Responsible for requirement definition, design, development, test, release, and service operation process in project

  • Deal with performance tuning and review architecture to improve development productivity and availability

  • Improvement for the system's stable operation and reducing operation processes

jobs.title: Data Science Engineer
jobs.content:
Position Summary:


We are seeking highly motivated data science engineers to work together with our data scientists to create various data science solutions for the rapidly growing Rakuten group, which provides 50+ services to more than 80 million users in Japan and 300 million users around the world.


Some numbers:



  • 55.9 billion USD of global gross transaction volume on our various platforms

  • 31 million search queries everyday

  • 2 transactions every second on Rakuten Travel

  • 200+ million items sold every year on our e-commerce platforms

  • 2 milion active accounts on Rakuten Securities


Responsibilities:


In this position, data science engineers are mainly expected to understand our structured and unstructured data and create and automate the processing of data such as extraction, transformation and load (ETL) in order to design data mart and optimize our data architectures.  In addition, data engineer are also encouraged to work closely with other engineers and data scientists to apply data science solution and turn data into intelligence that we can act on.

jobs.title: Smartphone App Engineer - E-Commerce Services
jobs.content:
We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer with proven Mobile Application Development experience in our Tokyo office. This position will develop native internal enterprise applications to support our company’s employees and business partners.  We build tools to support E-commerce merchants, real-time performance dashboards, and fun applications that help support communication and culture across all of our global offices and brands.  You must be a self -motivated person with superior communication and organization skill who wants to:



  • Create exciting new mobile experiences for a global audience.

  • Expand your technical skillset across a range of mobile and back-end technologies.

  • Work in a Global Organization.


Responsibilities:



  • Collaborate with partners to build and launch apps using Rakuten Mobile SDK and Mobile Ecosystem.

  • Create custom mobile apps, documentation and targeted demos for partners and related showcasing

  • Lead the integration process from initial demo all the way through to final launch and everything in between

  • Work with product managers and engineering to prioritize customer feedback into backlog

  • Create and review technical documentation, tutorials and content for SDK developer portal

  • Advocate and evangelize for our partners throughout Rakuten Group companies.

  • Lead with creativity and confidence

jobs.title: Web Performance Engineering Development Manager - THAILAND
jobs.content:
PLEASE NOTE THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND - full relocation and visa provided. Agoda Overview:


Agoda is one of the leading technology companies, not only in the industry but the world. We want candidates who have the need for speed, and appreciate that a faster website means a better customer experience. The right candidate has experience creating lightning quick websites using best practice and the latest technologies. You will know how to create scalable infrastructure and architecture ensuring content is measured in milliseconds not seconds and delivering an uninterrupted customer experience.

Part manager, part technical lead, part researcher, part evangelist. The role involves developing and experimenting the most optimal way to deliver web pages and content to the customer as fast as possible on any device or browser. You will be a technical leader able to rapidly prototype, measure and deliver best practice for high performance website development.

Responsibilities:

Candidates will be exposed to the business side, and be able to measure the true value of their work. As a technology evangelist you will have to identify areas for optimization, then research and prototype solutions to develop best practices to propagate across the website development teams. You will be required to analyze and tune bottlenecks in code, content delivery and on the full array of browsers and client.

Key Skills:
  • Previous experience in a Web Performance role
  • Experience of running a team (min 6)
  • Explain the full flow of Navigation Timings and how each step can impact the customer and how to measure and monitor this information.
  • Exceptional OO and software development.
  • Deep understanding of web protocols and networking.
  • Web application design, architecture and optimization.
  • Database tuning and stored procedure optimization.
  • Understand browser behavior and events and how browsers interpret HTML, CSS, DOM etc. to produce pages on any device as fast as possible.
  • Experience designing high traffic websites.
  • Knowledge of broadband, 3G and 4G Networks as well as how traffic passes through internet exchanges is a considered a plus.


Every millisecond counts. We want innovative ideas about how browsers can render content in milliseconds, that we can process TB's of data in minutes, or how to architect the server side to support tens of thousands of requests a second.

Technologies of interest (we are not expecting you to have them all):
  • Java (or other JVM languages), C#
  • js, JavaScript, Gulp
  • HTML and CSS and SASS
  • Memcached, Redis
  • Cassandra, Hadoop
  • MySQL, SQLServer, Postgres


A good standard of English both written and spoken is required.

Please note this role is open to both Thai and International candidates.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer in IoT Company
jobs.content: We are looking for a software developer with experience in Java and Groovy to join our server team and help us boosting the development of the tado° server application. Our current team is small and multidisciplinary, so the tasks we perform are as diverse as our needs, including not only server backend development, but also modern JavaScript-based frontend components as well as interfaces for mobile apps and encrypted communication technologies for keeping our embedded devices connected. Another interesting field we are focusing on is the enhancement of our server side self learning control and pattern recognition algorithms.

jobs.title: Development Manager - Backend Systems
jobs.content:
PLEASE NOTE THIS ROLE IS FOR RELOCATION TO BANGKOK, THAILAND - full visa and relocation package provided.

Agoda Overview:

Are you looking for challenges in building a very large scale system, say millions updates a day? We are looking for two top notch development managers to lead the development team of our hotel inventory system, that manage rates and allotments of rooms from hotels from all over the world. The system consists of both responsive web applications, API that hundreds of thousands of partners use to connect their inventory with Agoda, and background processing that keeps everything running across multiple data centers. Since Agoda is the fasted growing online travel agency, there are millions of inventory updates coming through this connectivity API every single day. And yet, we still manage to have the information reflected on web site in almost real time.

Our ideal candidates are experience agile development managers who master technology to the point where you can make a trade off and decide when to use which technology, and push our platform forward. At the same time, also have solid agile experience to deliver at rapid pace. If your career has begrudgingly moved you somewhat away from coding because you spend more and more time managing a team but you are so technology focused that you continue with IT hobby interests and technology still holds its fascination for you then you will fit in very well here.

Experience with large distributed systems is a must. There are many components that make up our supplies system from web site, web service API, Windows service, message queue, etc.

Responsibilities:
  • Lead team of at 6 - 12 energetic developers
  • Drive design and architecture of the system
  • Drive engineering best practices (unit testing, continuous delivery, code review, etc.)
  • Drive the execution of the team toward the vision. Visionary and pragmatic.
  • Grow and coach team members. Always challenge team to be higher performer.
  • Work closely with product owner to provide technical direction


Some of the technologies that should be familiar with and be expert on couple of them. You don't need to be expert in all of them.
  • Frontend web development technologies (E.g.: ASP.NET MVC, Python, Play framework)
  • Web service technologies (E.g.: WCF, REST, ASP.NET Web API)
  • Relational database (E.g.: SQL Server, Oracle)
  • NoSQL database technologies (E.g.: Cassandra, Hadoop, Couchbase)
  • Message queueing technologies (E.g.: Kafka, RabbitMQ, ActiveMQ, MSMQ)
  • Object Oriented Languages (E.g.: C#, Java, Scala)
  • Continuous Integration (Jenkins)
  • Performance and load testing


Qualifications:
  • 5-10 years' experience in software development and a mix of the above mentioned technologies.
  • At least 3 years' experience in a leadership/influencer position: team lead, development manager or architect.
  • Must have worked in an Agile environment and understands Scrum
  • The ability to communicate clearly in spoken and written English
  • Familiarity with travel industry and rate system is a plus.


We welcome both local and international applications for this role. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available.

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Search Expert
jobs.content:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND. VISA AND RELOCATION ASSISTANCE PROVIDED

Your chance to create the best text search platform in the industry!! Software Engineer -Search Expert (Elastic Search, Lucene, Solr) - Custom Analysers, Scorers, Geographic Lookups, Lucene, Solr, ElasticSearch TH-Bangkok

Overview:

Do you have any experience within Text Search, NLP, ElasticSearch/Solr/Lucene and associated technologies? If so you could be a great addition to the team here at Agoda in Bangkok, Thailand.

Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online hotel booking platform in Asia, and as a Priceline Group company, we are part of the largest online travel company in the world.

What are we looking to do?

We are looking to create the best text search platform in the world, within this industry.

Right now we, and our competitors provide fairly basic functionality leveraging ElasticSearch for geographic lookups. We have a plan to extend this significantly and become the world's best for this kind of work.

We do have a roadmap, end goal and a very excited product manager. What we don't have is a technical lead/visionary. What we are looking for however is somebody that has the skills and passion to take it to the next level.

We are looking for someone who has the proficiency to write custom analyzers, scorers, filters etc. When sat with someone from China, Japan, can use that person's knowledge and plug it in to the engine to get the desired behavior.

Our investment in text search, accuracy and what we can do with it is not going to go away - this is something we want to invest years into.

We also see this as a real opportunity to do something nobody else is doing and will have huge conversion gains.

This would be a really significant part of our website and we need someone of your caliber to make it happen.

If this sounds like you please get in touch now!

jobs.title: Big Data Engineer - Relocate to Thailand - Scala, Java, Python
jobs.content:
Role based in Bangkok, Thailand - We welcome both local and international applications for this role. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for eligible candidates.

Big Data Engineer

Overview:

Our Bangkok team is looking for top quality passionate data engineers to build products across our next gen data platform products.

Our systems scale across multiple data centers, totaling a few million writes per second and managing petabytes of data. We deal with problems from real-time data-ingestion, replication, enrichment, storage and analytics. We are not just using Big Data technologies, we are pushing them to the edge.

Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online hotel booking platform in Asia. And as a Priceline Group company, we are part of the largest online travel company in the world. We have the dynamism and short chain of command of a startup and the capital to make things happen. In this competitive world of online travel agencies, finding even the slightest advantage in the data can make or break a company. That is why we put data systems in our top priorities.

While we are proud of what we built so far, there is still a long way to go to fulfil our vision of data. We are looking for people who are as excited about data technology as we are, to join the fight.
You can be part of designing, building, deploying (and probably debugging) products across all aspects of our core data platform products.

Responsibilities:
  • Improve scalability, stability, accuracy, speed and efficiency of our existing data systems
  • Design, build, test and deploy new libraries, frameworks or full systems for our core systems while keeping to the highest standards of testing and code quality
  • Work with experienced engineers and product owners to identify and build tools to automate many large-scale data management / analysis tasks.


Requirements
  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science /Information Systems/Engineering/related field
  • At least 3 years' experience working with modern systems languages
  • Strong experience in JVM languages (Java / Scala in particular)
  • Experience debugging and reasoning about production issues
  • A good understanding of data architecture principles


Bonuses
  • Any experience with 'Big Data' technologies / tools
  • Strong systems administration skills in Linux
  • Python/Perl/Go/Shell scripting skills also a plus.
  • Experience working with Lambda Architectures
  • Experience working with open source products
  • Working in an agile environment using test driven methodologies.


A few of the technologies we use

Spray, Hadoop, Kibana, ElasticSearch, Yarn, Akka, Mesos, Kafka, Sensu, Redis, Scala, Python, Cassandra, Postgres, Spark, OpenStack, Logstash, Couchbase, Vertica, Grafana, Go.

We welcome both local and international applications for this role. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for eligible candidates.

jobs.title: Back End Team Developer - Scala, Node.js, Python - Thailand
jobs.content:
PLEASE NOTE THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND - We are looking for persons interested in relocating, full visa and relocation package available.

We are a big technology company, but this opportunity is specifically for an important role on a small team. This ambitious team is thinking every day about how to use the latest technology to build new exciting services that will be used by millions of people. We really need someone special to join us and help lead the back end development.

Work will focus on building a service that combines many different 3rd party API integrations.

You must be confident in code quality and execution, working in an agile team.

Industry knowledge and understanding of the e-commerce and B2B SaaS is a plus.

Office location - Bangkok, Thailand.

Technology you should be comfortable with or interested in learning: OpenStack, Scala, Node.js, SQL, Go, Python, RabbitMQ, Redis, REST API's

ESSENTIAL RESPONSIBILITIES:
  • Implementation of API endpoints for data manipulation and processes.
  • Build and maintain core application features.
  • Write unit and integration tests.
  • Collaborate in all project planning.
  • Work with both front-end and back-end web developers.
  • Prioritize tasks and coordinate work within the team.
  • Engaging with current team to improve and optimize current code and planning practices.
  • Be prepared to lead strategic technology decisions.
  • Take responsibility for successful delivery of solutions.
  • You will also be bridging the gap between the user experience and the server-side infrastructure, taking an active role on both.


YOU WILL BE A GREAT FIT IF
  • You are passionate about TDD.
  • You care about both user experience and developer experience.
  • You write DRY, readable, and modular code.
  • Are interested in learning new programming languages and tools.


RECOMMENDED SKILLS (NOT 100% REQUIRED):
  • Strong experience building and improving scalable applications.
  • Experience with using ORM and MVC frameworks.
  • Experience with HTTP, WebSocket, and Message Queue protocols.
  • Experience designing and building Restful APIs using Django Rest Framework.
  • Ability to learn and integrate 3rd party API's quickly into existing applications.
  • Ability to work independently and manage projects with many moving parts.
  • Familiarity with session and authentication best practices, access control, and preventing CSRF.
  • Familiarity with how front-end frameworks work such as Angular, Backbone, React JS, etc.
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git, GitHub.
  • Be willing to help your teammates, share your knowledge with them, and learn from them.


This is a permanent, full time position working on-site in our offices at Central World in downtown Bangkok, Thailand. We are open to candidates from all nationalities and will help with relocation if you are not currently based here.

jobs.title: Android Developer - Relocate to Bangkok, Thailand
jobs.content:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND ONLY! Full relocation and visa sponsorship provided!

Android Developer - Bangkok

Overview:

Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online hotel booking platform in Asia, and as a Priceline Group company, we are part of the largest online travel company in the world.

We understand the value of a great mobile experience for our customers and are constantly investing in mobile app development. Last year we launched a very successful update to our iOS and Android apps - a totally reengineered and redesigned experience - built from the ground up with the newest technologies. This doesn't stop us from constantly extending our product, re-evaluating outdated technologies, and constantly pushing to become the world's best.

We are looking for engineers who love and understand native apps and seek the challenge of using cutting edge technologies to create robust, smooth, and beautiful apps. You will be expected to deliver high quality, well-designed, and thoroughly tested code within tight time constraints, so a solid understanding of modern app design principles and testing will be crucial. You are also expected to be fluent in explaining and justifying your design decisions. Expertise in clean architecture and reactive programming is a major plus, but we expect candidates to be able to master these and many other tools as we go.

In addition, we expect superb attention to detail on the UI and performance of code produced. We believe a high-performance back-end is not enough. We also have to deliver the best possible UI and UX experience to our customers when it comes to layout, animations, and transitions.

Ultimately, we are looking for real technologists who have a great passion for mobile apps. We want innovative ideas on how to enhance our products using the latest cutting edge technologies, and if needed, define our own new standards.

Responsibilities:

Candidates will join the mobile app scrum team with iOS, Android, and backend developers, and as part of their day-to-day responsibilities will:
  • Come up with the best suitable technology and architecture for their tasks
  • Work closely with all team members to understand full stack functionality and architecture
  • Communicate constantly with product owners to understand and measure business values of developed features
  • Contribute ideas (technological and product) to enhance the overall app experience


Qualifications:

Technologies of interest (we are not expecting you to have them all):
  • Java 7/8
  • Latest trends in Android SDK (Native)
  • Android Studio/Gradle
  • RxJava
  • Dagger2
  • jUnit 4, mockito, Robolectric, espresso
  • Retrofit
  • Fresco
  • Analytics (Fabric, Google Analytics, etc)
  • A/B testing
  • Git


Engineering topics of interest:
  • Clean architecture
  • UI Design-patterns (MVP and etc)
  • Design-patterns (Gang of four)
  • Object oriented programming and design principles
  • Testing (unit/integration/system/...)
  • Automation of work process (CI, tools, etc)
  • Strafe-jumping like a pro in Quake 3 with your colleagues




Please note this role is open to both Thai and International candidates, however a good standard of English (both written and spoken) is a must.

jobs.title: Senior Network Security Consultant/Advisor - Bangkok, Thailand
jobs.content:
PLEASE NOTE THIS ROLE IS BASED IN BANGKOK, THAILAND - Full visa and relocation provided

Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online hotel booking platform in Asia. And as a Priceline Group company, we are part of the largest online travel company in the world. Technology is not just what we do - it's at the heart of who we are. We have the dynamism and short chain of command of a start-up and the capital to make things happen. We love innovation and putting new technologies to work to extend our lead on the competition.

Working in one of the largest international Internet employers headquartered in Asia, your work has an impact on what we do around the globe. We move fast - why wait ages to see your ideas go live? Work on tough challenges, safe in the knowledge that you are surrounded by people as smart as you are (if not smarter!) to help solve them. And while we're on the subject, Agoda people come from over 65 countries: It's an incredible technical creative melting pot.

What's stopping you from getting in touch?

Responsibilities:

Working in a fast paced online business where changes happen at an incredible speed, availability and optimization are key considerations for our customers.

Duties will entail strategizing and advising on viable solutions for long term strong perimeter defense to prevent or at minimum recover fast during attacks (but not limited to) such as DDOS, bad crawlers etc.

About you:

We are after candidates whose mind is 'wired like a cyber-adversary' from a technical standpoint to be able to execute long term protection from cyber threats and weapons commonly used to conduct such impactful attacks.

We welcome candidates who have an abundance of security understanding from a network layer perspective and be creative with their problem solving with frequent thinking outside the 'security' box.

Some core skills and experience you should possess for this role with minimum of 4 years' experience:
  • Solid Juniper, Arista and Fortinet Technologies
  • Experience in APT solution
  • In-depth knowledge of DDOS (in particular Arbor) solutions
  • In-depth knowledge of IDS/IPS/WAF solutions
  • In-depth knowledge of SIEM solutions
  • Information security forensics experience
  • Solid knowledge of Linux, scripting, network scanning and auditing tools
  • Solid knowledge of data communications including network topology, network architectures and network security.
  • In-depth knowledge of routers, servers and firewalls within a secure WAN/WLAN/LAN environment.


Certification: CISSP (Desirable), CCIE (desirable not essential), JCIE (desirable not essential), Fortinet NSE, Arbor (or similar DDOS solutions) and CEH (Desirable not essential)

jobs.content:

Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online hotel booking platform in Asia. And as a Priceline Group company, we are part of the largest online travel company in the world. jobs.title: Research Scientist  -  World Leading Online Travel Company
jobs.content:
Agoda are hiring Research Scientists in Tel Aviv!

We are expanding our research center of excellent for Agoda in Tel Aviv, Israel and we are looking for top notch talent to join us. This is a very senior role, where you will be working on some of the toughest challenges within the Data Science team.

Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online hotel booking platform in Asia, and as a Priceline Group company, we are part of the largest online travel company in the world. We are the perfect combination of a fast dynamic startup atmosphere, with the capital to make things happen.

Working for the largest online travel group, our work has immediate impact, touching millions of people around the globe.

Job description:
  • Apply your expertise in mathematics, quantitative analysis, data mining and machine learning to develop models and algorithms to improve performance of different aspects in online accommodation reservations
  • Make decisions on whether specific problems can be solved and how they can be solved based on raw datasets
  • Work with the business domains and develop predictive models and algorithms to support business decisions
  • Define the roadmap and contribute to the development of solutions for a variety of projects
  • Develop data automated systems that convert noisy data sets into significant signals of user behavior and suggest alternative problem solving methods
  • Develop best practices for data collection and experimentation, data requirements and communicate those to product engineering teams
  • Explore new technologies, innovative instrumentation and data collection to develop unique data sources and utilize them


Minimal qualifications
  • PhD. in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Engineering or related field.
  • Publications at top-tier peer-reviewed conferences or journals
  • Proven track record of innovation in creating novel algorithms and advancing the state of the art
  • Experience with at least one scripting/ modelling language (Python/Scala)
  • Knowledge of relational databases and non-relational databases and query languages (SQL)
  • Ability to initiate and drive research projects from start to completion with minimal guidance
  • Ability to lead projects and mentor more intermediate members of the team.
  • Experience with distributed programming: a.k.a: spark.


Please note we can only accept applications from candidates who are eligible to work in Israel and unfortunately are not able to sponsor work permits for this role.

jobs.title: Data Scientist - Join Asia's Leading Hotel Booking Platform
jobs.content:
We're Hiring Data Scientists for our Tel Aviv office!

Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online hotel booking platform in Asia. And as a Priceline Group company, we are part of the largest online travel company in the world. We have the dynamism and short chain of command of a start-up and the capital to make things happen. What's stopping you from getting in touch?

We move fast - why wait ages to see your ideas go live? Work on tough challenges, safe in the knowledge that you are surrounded by people as smart as you are (if not smarter!) to help solve them. And while we're on the subject, Agoda people come from over 65 countries: It's an incredible technical creative melting pot.

Technology is not just what we do - it's at the heart of who we are. We put cutting-edge technology in your hands so you can help us change the way people run their lives. We want you to come here so they can get there - and get your career going places, too.

Maintaining this growth requires an incredible amount of data, a superior IT infrastructure, and world class talent to bring it all together.

Responsibilities:
  • Develop predictive models and algorithms to support business decisions
  • Work with the business domains to help shape the right questions
  • Mine our large & growing volumes of data to find actionable insights to drive ongoing improvements
  • Be part of a production oriented team


Qualifications:

Do you have what it takes?
  • At least 3 years working as a statistician / analyst / data scientist
  • At least a BSc in Statistics / Computer Science / Physics / Operational Research / Math or other quantitative field (a PhD is a major plus)
  • Good knowledge of what's "Under the hood" of statistical methods (and preferably knowing how to utilise them in R or equivalent).
  • Proficiency in at least 1 scripting/programming language like Python, C#, Java, C++, or Scala (our native language so a major plus)
  • Knowledge of SQL a plus
  • A good balance between theory and practice
  • A strong desire to learn
  • The desire to keep up with the latest technologies and stay ahead of the curve
  • Great communication and interpersonal skills; a good sense of humour is always a plus
  • Mindset of a team player
  • Independent and quick learner


Please note we can only accept applications from candidates who are residing in Israel and unfortunately are not able to sponsor work permits for this role.

jobs.title: Data Applications Engineer - Machine Learning - OO/Python/Scala
jobs.content:
Agoda Overview:

Agoda, one of Asia's leading IT employers in Southeast Asia, is looking for experienced OO software engineers to help us expand, scale and innovate in our machine learning development team.

Our Bangkok team is looking for top-quality software engineers that are passionate about data and software at scale using modern technology to solve problems. You will enjoy working in an agile environment writing lean, efficient code that serves as the backbone of our cutting edge online hotel booking platform.

The machine learning team develops systems that affect the entire business funnel. Our long term vision is to have Machine Learning participate in the decision making of every aspect of the product in real time - From the initial marketing to the post-payment page.

Our systems are not decision supporting, but rather decision making, so we are not only bound to delivering top notch algorithms, but also to develop with consistent quality, high availability, resiliency and scale.

The team is composed of experienced mathematicians and developers, working together to create products that make a substantial impact on the business of the company. Working with us will expose developers to inner workings of Machine Learning from both the theoretical and practical side.

Information Technology is our core competency, and an IT career with us provides excellent growth opportunities in an exciting, multicultural environment. Our industry moves fast, and so must we - but we have a great time doing it.

Responsibilities:

We need you to help us:
  • Design, write, test and deploy new systems
  • Build our systems, scalable and ready for millions of visitors, daily.
  • Use our hardware to the fullest extent possible
  • Ensure our systems are fault tolerant or self-healing
  • Determine how to store and retrieve our data. Petabytes of it.
  • Develop parallel analytic models (linear regression, random forest etc.,)
  • Develop analytic models on Massively Parallel Processing (MPP) in-memory analytical platform.
  • Analyze data using SQL, R, python.
  • Debug memory dumps; thrashing thread pools, scaling load tests
  • Fight with the garbage collector
  • Find the next technological innovation that will make us the top travel website


Some of the technologies that we use (in production):
  • Big Data Technologies (E.g.: Hadoop, Spark)
  • OO technologies (E.g.: Python, Scala)
  • Server side web technologies (E.g.: Django, Celery, Spray)
  • NoSQL database technologies (E.g.: Cassandra, Hadoop, Redis)
  • Messaging (E.g.: RabbitMQ, Kafka)


Qualifications:

Required
    • At least 3 years' experience in back end/server side software development using OO technologies (Scala, Python etc.)
    • Experience of working in a test driven environment
    • Great communication and interpersonal skills
    • Mindset of a team player
    • The ability to communicate clearly in spoken and written English
    • Bachelor's degree in CompSci/Information Systems/Engineering/related field


Not Required but a big plus
    • experience in modern development technologies (as in "the technologies we use" section, or similar)
    • experience with large scale/distributed systems in production
    • Academic level knowledge of statistics




We welcome both local and international applications for this role. Full visa sponsorship and relocation assistance available for eligible candidates.

jobs.title: Back End Team Developer - C#, Java, Python
jobs.content:
About Agoda

We are a big technology company, but this opportunity is specifically for an important role on a small team. This ambitious team is thinking every day about how to use the latest technology to build new exciting services that will be used by millions of people. We really need someone special to join us and help lead the back end development.

Work will focus on building a service that combines many different 3rd party API integrations.

You must be confident in code quality and execution, working in an agile team.

Industry knowledge and understanding of the e-commerce and B2B SaaS is a plus.

Office location - Bangkok, Thailand.

Technology you should be comfortable with or interested in learning: OpenStack, SQL, Go, Python, RabbitMQ, Redis, C#, REST API's

ESSENTIAL RESPONSIBILITIES:
  • Implementation of API endpoints for data manipulation and processes.
  • Build and maintain core application features.
  • Write unit and integration tests.
  • Collaborate in all project planning.
  • Work with both front-end and back-end web developers.
  • Prioritise tasks and coordinate work within the team.
  • Engaging with current team to improve and optimise current code and planning practices.
  • Be prepared to lead strategic technology decisions.
  • Take responsibility for successful delivery of solutions.
  • You will also be bridging the gap between the user experience and the server-side infrastructure, taking an active role on both.


YOU WILL BE A GREAT FIT IF
  • You are passionate about TDD.
  • You care about both user experience and developer experience.
  • You write DRY, readable, and modular code.
  • Are interested in learning new programming languages and tools.


RECOMMENDED SKILLS (NOT 100% REQUIRED):
  • Strong experience building and improving scalable applications.
  • Experience with using ORM and MVC frameworks.
  • Experience with HTTP, WebSocket, and Message Queue protocols.
  • Experience designing and building Restful APIs using Django Rest Framework.
  • Ability to learn and integrate 3rd party API's quickly into existing applications.
  • Ability to work independently and manage projects with many moving parts.
  • Familiarity with session and authentication best practices, access control, and preventing CSRF.
  • Familiarity with how front-end frameworks work such as Angular, Backbone, React JS, etc.
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git, GitHub.
  • Be willing to help your teammates, share your knowledge with them, and learn from them.


This is a permanent, full time position working on-site in our offices at Central World in downtown Bangkok, Thailand. We are open to candidates from all nationalities and will help with relocation if you are not currently based here.

jobs.title: Senior Site Reliability Engineer
jobs.content:
OfferUp is looking for a Senior Site Reliability Engineer to join our Operations Team.  We provide tools and services to all teams in OfferUp for managing an increasingly complex production infrastructure in AWS.  Our success is measured by our ability to allow everyone to stand up and deploy services quickly with no downtime.  In this role you will be at the forefront of driving and developing the technology that automates everything.  


Responsibilities:



  • Work with other SREs to build a comprehensive set of tools to automate and monitor our production infrastructure

  • Work with Engineering to build resilient, operable, self-healing services

  • Participate in reasonable on-call rotations with the rest of Engineering

jobs.title: DevOps Engineer - Bangkok
jobs.content:
Agoda DevOps are looking for unique people to solve Agoda's unique problems.

We are packed with world-class talents in a flat organization that is not encumbered by bureaucratic structures. Rapid growing teams are developing features that need to go out at a pace current technology will not be able to handle.

Agoda DevOps are directly responsible in moving features into customer hands impossibly fast, while impossibly safe. We are building systems that give engineers direct feedback of integrated code quality metrics and tests. Hours of verifications has to be executed in a few minutes, deployments needs to be all robots work and monitoring needs to be flawless given of the speed where things will be moving.

That means our works includes a scalable swarm of docker containers. A whole virtualized environment of Asia's leading booking site in a laptop. An obliteration of conventional processes and establishing automated tools and systems. A robust event queue to track movement of features from developer commits to production. A scalable automated delivery system to support a growing websites, growing customers and growing number of engineers.

That also means writing many tools and inventing a platform which does not currently exists to serve Agoda's development.

Expect not to be commanded what to do. We are looking for individuals who share our vision and values to bring their best in solving these challenges together.

Qualifications
  • Take initiative and own issues.
  • Takes Agile and incremental value delivery to heart
  • Passionate in automation to support multiple releases a day
  • Excellent communication skills to understand development teams needs and challenges
  • Work on a small, focused team


Bonuses
  • Experienced in supporting Web application deployment at scale
  • Source control: Git, Mercury
  • CI: Jenkins , Teamcity
  • UI Tests with Selenium
  • Experience with configuration management: Puppet, Chef, Ansible, Powershell
  • Built a monitoring system for DevOps systems

jobs.title: Graduate Software Engineer - Asia's leading OTA
jobs.content:
Agoda Overview:

For our rapidly growing IT organization, we are looking for Graduate Software Engineers from many different experiences and qualifications to strengthen our teams.

Being a software engineer at Agoda isn't just about developing software. It's about being a center piece of the innovation and technical excellence that the rapidly changing field of online travel requires. If you find yourself frequently pondering how to do things faster and better, how technology could interact, how a new technology would help you to do new things or how a customer would use your products, then Agoda is the right place for you.

Responsibilities:

We expect our engineers to think about the full life cycle of our products, and not just about a single piece of code. From customer requirements, technology selection to coding standards, agile development, unit and application testing. You might call yourself "full stack" or you might consider yourself an expert in a certain field, but you will have a keen interest in how the different systems work together.

Qualifications:

Some of the technologies that we work with:
  • Scala, C# or Java. You might have experience in other languages but are confident you can learn.
  • Frontend technologies like Mocha, SAS and frameworks like Angular and Bootstrap (in addition to HTML and Javascript, of course).
  • Data platforms like SQL, Cassandra or Hadoop. You understand that different applications have different data requirements.
  • Core engineering infrastructure tools like Git for source control, Jenkins for Continuous Integration and Puppet for deployment.


Please get in touch if you are experienced in any of the above technologies (note - we are not looking for you to have them all). We are interested in speaking to persons of any level from junior candidates to experts in their field.

Please apply now and we will tell you all about the numerous projects we currently have on the go!

We are happy to receive CV from both international & local candidates as we offer relocation assistance and visa sponsorship for eligible candidates.

jobs.title: C++ Software Engineers in Silicon Valley and Raleigh
jobs.content:
219 Design helps great companies invent products that change the world. 219ers have improved patient outcomes, changed the way we enjoy sports, and revolutionized data transfer - just to name a few. We achieve better outcomes because we create new solutions by crossing engineering disciplines and challenging assumptions.


At 219, you will develop tangible prototypes and products that get into the hands of real people while maintaining an average 40-hour work week. You will share in the profit and help shape our company. You will continue to develop and learn to be a stronger strategic thinker and inspirational leader through weekly discussion groups, leadership development, informal knowledge sharing via Pizza Fridays, transparent corporate management via Sandwich Monday’s, and formal training. At 219, we see our job as more than just a way to make money – it's how we fulfill an inner drive to solve problems and to express our creativity.


As a C++ software engineer at 219 Design, you will work on a diverse set of projects with a variety of clients. You will be a public face of 219 as you tackle big challenges for products that improve people's lives. We need engineers who are adaptable, display leadership and management qualities, and are passionate about their work. If 219 sounds like a good fit and you are fluent in C++, please apply!


To apply, please fill out our application which should take about 10 minutes. For serious consideration, have your resume and a code sample (C++ preferred) handy for upload.

jobs.title: Graduate Mobile Developer - Asia's leading e-commerce company
jobs.content:
Agoda Overview:

Agoda is the largest and fastest growing online hotel booking platform in Asia, and as a Priceline Group company, we are part of the largest online travel company in the world. Despite the success and size of the company we still operate with a start-up feel; you get to be part of choosing where and what you're working on, the technologies and how we solve the business concerns.

We understand the value of a great mobile experience for our customers and are constantly investing in mobile app development. Right now we are on the finishing lines of launching an exciting update to our iOS and Android apps. We are using this opportunity to reengineer our API with the newest technologies to better support constant growth and improve overall performance of our system. We have a roadmap to extend this significantly and are constantly pushing to become the world's best.

We are looking for graduate engineers who love and understand back-end and seek the challenge of using cutting edge technologies to create a robust, scalable and blazing-fast API. You will be expected to learn to deliver high quality, well-designed and thoroughly tested code within tight time constraints; so an understanding of OO design principles and familiarity with unit-testing will be crucial. You will become fluent at explaining and justifying your decisions. Knowledge of distributed platforms (like Hadoop, Cassandra, etc) is a major plus, but we expect candidates to be able to master these and many other technologies as we go.

In addition, we expect superb attention to the details of performance and scalability of produced solutions (SQL queries, smart caching, code and more). You will be expected to learn how to introduce proper measurements in production and constantly analyze them to verify set performance goals and suggest further improvements.

Ultimately, we are looking for real graduate technologists who have a great passion to creating the robust, scalable and reliable back-end architecture required to support fantastic apps. We want innovative ideas on how to save our customer another 100 milliseconds waiting for results or how to architect the server side to support tens of thousands of requests a second.


Responsibilities:

Candidates will join the mobile API scrum team and as part of their day-to-day responsibilities will:
  • Come up with best suitable technology and architecture for their tasks
  • Work closely with app teams to understand their needs
  • Communicate constantly with product owner to understand and measure business values of developed features
  • Contribute ideas (technological and product) to enhance the overall app experience



Qualifications:

Technologies of interest (we are not expecting you to have them all):
  • C# and/or Java (or other JVM language)
  • iOS, Android, Swift, Objective C
  • Scripting (Python / Ruby / )
  • WCF / Web API, IIS
  • Django / Play Framework
  • Cassandra / Hadoop
  • Memcached, Redis
  • Postesql, SQL Server, MySql
  • Jenkins, CSpider

jobs.title: Front End Web Engineer
jobs.content:
At Sullivan, front-end web engineers bring the strategic creative design to life in working code across multiple devices, platforms, and project types. You’ll work closely with digital strategists, user experience architects, designers, copywriters, and other developers to transform our clients’ complex products and services into experiences that clarify, engage, and inspire action.


This role requires candidate to be onsite full-time in our office in New York City.


You are particularly skilled at understanding how to translate complex visual systems into logical pattern libraries, with a primary skill set in working with a variety of modern CMS platforms. You are an expert at HTML, CSS and JS and are familiar with web standards that ensure your code is easy to maintain and clearly organized. You have a robust set of skills when it comes to testing, deploying code, working in CI environments, and collaborating with remote teams. You will work on projects ranging from large-scale websites to smaller campaign websites or social programs. Ideally, you are familiar with either iOS or Android mobile application development languages and one or more content management systems (Wordpress or Drupal preferably). You have familiarity with DAMs and are well versed in SEO principles.

jobs.title: Part Time Coding Instructor
jobs.content:
HOW TO APPLY: We are hiring instructors for Seattle, San Francisco, New York, Philadelphia, Austin, Los Angeles, and Chicago. Please click on the appropriate link below to submit your application.


App Academy is looking to hire Part Time Bootcamp Prep Instructors (10-12 evening hours per week) in San Francisco, Seattle, Austin, New York, Los Angeles, Philadelphia, and Chicago. Bootcamp Prep is a 4-week, part-time course (M-F, 6:30:30-8pm), that teaches web development fundamentals, up to an intermediate level of JavaScript, and is catered towards students without prior programming experience.


The goal of Bootcamp Prep is to provide students with the knowledge required to be accepted into the top programming schools in the nation. This is a perfect opportunity for a current computer science undergraduate, graduate student, or software engineer.


As the Instructor of Bootcamp Prep, you will lead a class of 15-20 students, and teach them on week-nights over 4 weeks, culminating in students applying to their schools of interest. You will deliver lectures, assist students with problem sets, and collect/evaluate data on student progress. App Academy will provide you with the curriculum and logistical support required to run the class, but you will also have the opportunity to provide input into the design of and direction of the curriculum.


The expected amount of total hours per week will be between 10-12 hours per week through the duration of the course. Total compensation for the 4-week period will be a fixed sum of $2,000, which amounts to roughly $42/hr. The contract can be extended to future months based on mutual interest. 


RESPONSIBILITIES:



  • Leading classroom instruction by delivering lectures and supporting students as they complete the problem set. Complete a week long training course

  • Provide input into the design of and direction of the curriculum

  • Administer and grade assessments to evaluate student progress.

  • Share data with lead teachers/advisors

  • Communicate learning targets and outcomes to students on a regular basis

  • Promoting best programming practices and a growth mindset amongst students
